snippet: GILBERT--Elaine. Elaine Caplan Gilbert, 89, on January 27, 2016. Beloved of the late Marvin (Bud) Gilbert; cherished mother of Scott (Anne) and Glen (Beth); adored grandmother of Daniel (Leah), Sarah (Zach), David, Rebecca (Scott) and Samantha; loving great-grandmother of Natalia; dear sister of Joan Cohen. A vivacious woman of great beauty and charm, she will forever be in our hearts. Graveside services to be held at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY on January 31 at 11am. Contributions in Elaine's memory may be made to the Alzheimer's Association, 2900 Westchester Ave., Purchase, NY 10577. 1/3

A vivacious woman of great beauty and charm, she will forever be in our hearts. Graveside services to be held at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY on January 31 at 11am. Contributions in Elaine's memory may be made to the Alzheimer's Association, 2900 Westchester Ave., Purchase, NY 10577. 1/3
